item.description:
The next Stop the Wars Coalition meeting will be this Monday, 20 July, at 6:30 PM in

Encuentro 5 (http://www.encuentro5...)
33 Harrison Ave., 5th Floor
Boston, MA
Chinatown stop on the Orange line T

Here is a tentative agenda, which can be amended at the meeting:
1. Report on the National Assembly (http://natassembly.or...) (20 min)
2. Planning for October 17 rally (60 min)
2.A. Report on 13 July planning meeting (5 min)
2.B. Report on call-writing progress (5 min)
2.C. Outreach events/Chomsky talk (20 min)
2.D. Management of the boston-massaction email list (http://groups.google....) (10 min)
2.E. Other business about October rally (20 min)
3. Miscellaneous other Stop the Wars Coalition business (15 min)
4. Outline agenda for next time (5 min)

An important item on the agenda will be selecting a third panelist for the Chomsky event this Fall. Please think about candidates, and share any suggestions you may have.

For more information: http://stopthewars.or...
item.name: Antiwar Meetup
